segments.text: I can't stand being with you any more . I'm sick of your drinking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I swear I never drink again . Just give me another chance , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many chances have I given you , I've given up on you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know how hard I try to quit , I've lost without you . I am mot let you go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not just for your drinking . But you are lacking sense of responsibility .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to make money to support the family , so I have little time left to share with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even if I was seriously ill you couldn't spare a moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I told you I happened to be more important meeting at that time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just don't trust you any more .
segments.speaker: S1
